item.description:
Join us for an art inspired afternoon. We will go to the Allston Open Art Studios. The Allston Arts District is participating in a FOOD DRIVE to help support the Boston Food Bank, in dire need of support. In lieu of the dollar meetup fee - please bring non-perishable food items to the Boston Food Drive boxes during Open Studios. After the the art studio viewing we will have dinner.

When you RSVP - the RSVP is for both the Art studios and dinner unless otherwise noted. Dinner will be at Shabu Zen in Allston @ 6:15 pm.

Parking - there is free parking in the lot next to 119 Braintree St.

Allston Arts District 23nd Annual Open Studios
Saturday: noon-6 pm

Open Studios provides an exciting opportunity for visitors to interact directly with artists who create the work. See completed works and works in progress. You can purchase art for sale or commission something new.

This year, approximately 40 artists will show their work in painting, drawing, printmaking, collage, photography, video, sculpture, jewelry, boutique clothing and accessories, digital art, mixed media, wearables, fiber art, water media, faux finishing, typographic design, ink work, pastels, and more! In addition, children are invited to create a mural on the 4th floor at 119 Braintree Street.

The neighborhood of Allston is compact and diverse. All art studios are within an easy walking distance and can be seen in one day. A wide variety of outstanding ethnic restaurants abound in the area.


see website for more details about Open Art Studios.

http://www.allstonart...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be out in front @ 119 Braintree St.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Open Art Studios in Allston & Dinner
